d.f: `指~`托福~`測驗~。`是~`美~`國~`在~`全世界~`對~`母語~`非~`美~`語~`者~`所~`辦~`的~`美~`語~`能力~`測驗~，`其~`成績~`是~`申請~`入~`美~`就讀~`大學~`以上~`學校~`必備~`的~`文件~`之~`一~。`（~`英~Test of English as a Foreign Language，`縮~`稱~TOEFL）

francais: grâce à vous (employé souvent pour rendre un compliment, une salutation, etc.)
Test of English as a Foreign Language
Deutsch: Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL)  (S, Sprachw)
English: Test of English as a Foreign Language
(old) thanks to your lucky influence (polite reply to health inquiries)
